actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Automated Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Act.
short_title: Automated Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Reauthorization Act

summary.text: Automated Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Reauthorization Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize appropriations for grants for states, political subdivisions, Indian tribes, and tribal organizations to develop and implement public access defibrillation programs.

titles.title: Automated Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Reauthorization Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Automated Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Act.
